Defend American Jobs

Super PAC (Independent Expenditure-Only) - Unauthorized | ID: C00836221 | Registration date: March 29, 2023

The Defend American Jobs super PAC is a single-issue committee focused on cryptocurrency and blockchain policy, and is aimed at supporting conservative candidates. Although the committees do not acknowledge it, Defend American Jobs is closely tied to its progressive counterpart, Protect Progress — both of which are closely linked with the Fairshake super PAC.

Defend American Jobs has raised
$59,075,000
$4,525,000 came from direct contributions.
$54,550,000 was transferred from other committees.
They have spent
$56,310,965
of it so far.
